channel.title: Official Bitbay telegram chat rooms and social medias
channel.description:
Hello here bellow you can find:
1. Our official chat rooms 2. Our official media outlets 3. Our community rules
---
**1) CHAT ROOMS:**
* https://t.me/bitbayofficial Official Bitbay Channel (NO TRADING TALK HERE + English channel)
* https://t.me/bitbaytradingtalk Bitbay Channel to talk about trading
* https://t.me/bitbayofficialkorea Bitbay channel for Korean
* https://t.me/bitbaymarketrussia Bitbay channel for Russian
* https://t.me/FrenchBitBayOfficial Bitbay channel for French
* https://t.me/bitbaymarketarabic Bitbay channel for Arabic
* https://t.me/BitBayaespaoln Bitbay channel for Spanish
* https://chat.whatsapp.com/invite/1bUKgQzyKiPGCHZdgsAzru Bitbay channel for Indian ---
**2) SOCIAL MEDIA OUTLETS:**
**_English_** Facebook: https://goo.gl/UUJd6c Twitter: https://goo.gl/HBwocR Youtube: https://goo.gl/q4ZYN3 Reddit: https://goo.gl/mWnUwB LinkedIn: https://goo.gl/vvfp39
**_Arabic_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/UUZkLX Twitter : https://goo.gl/EAg9RQ
**_French_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/Em9CbC Twitter : https://goo.gl/Z2cW2E Jeuxvideo : https://goo.gl/V6R8nA
**_Russian_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/h7K2AX Twitter : https://goo.gl/2z6cZ3
**_Spanish_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/SwCzEU Twitter : https://goo.gl/44GmrC
**_Korean_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/NXhTHs Twitter : https://goo.gl/WheD93
**_Japanese_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/PvZM6b Twitter : https://goo.gl/e7dyjB
**_Chinese_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/K5GSxH Twitter : https://goo.gl/PST5tD Weibo : https://goo.gl/hDiHk5
**_Indian_** Facebook : https://goo.gl/qvyjdu Twitter : https://goo.gl/7F7e5S
Although if you need support, please use first our forums (..../forum-archive) as this way it will be archived for all to see! :slight_smile:
--- **3) COMMUNITY RULES:**
- No spamming/shilling - Focus discussions on Bitbay, not other projects/tokens/coins - No bad mouthing, no fudding, no name calling, be respectful & courteous - No price speculation please refer to our telegram @bitbaytradingtalk for trading discussions - Deliver value to the discussion, you can for example share any relevant news and articles - If you get a warning, respect it

item.title: Official Bitbay telegram chat rooms and social medias
item.dc:creator: @Mantrack
item.description:
@Mantrack wrote:

Hello here bellow you can find:

  1. Our official chat rooms
  2. Our official media outlets
  3. Our community rules

1) CHAT ROOMS:

  • https://t.me/bitbayofficial Official Bitbay Channel (NO TRADING TALK HERE + English channel)

  • https://t.me/bitbaytradingtalk Bitbay Channel to talk about trading
